RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 9500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICKIN GOOD TIME driving finish. ELUNICODECANDY restless gate, broke out slightly, game second. GREY BISCUIT drifted in, solid try. HIGH SIX JESS late kick. J BEST PRINCESS outfinished. HIGH ON CUERVO drifted out throughout. A TRAINER OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE TRAINER OF HIGH ON CUERVO CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST ELUNICODECANDY AND GREY BISCUIT FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Elunicodecandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, broke out slightly, game second

ENTRY.NAME: High On Cuervo
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Grey Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, solid try

ENTRY.NAME: High Six Jess
ENTRY.COMMENT: late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Kickin Good Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: driving finish

ENTRY.NAME: J Best Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORONASGOTHEART dueled, prevailed. DG ARMAGEDDON dueled, out kicked. RARE CREEK dueled, outfinished. APOLLITICAL SPLASH veered in midway. WHOWEHAVETOPAYB drifted out, chased. BULLY GIRL no factor. THE KIDS A COWBOY no impact.

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, outfinished

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, out kicked

ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, chased

ENTRY.NAME: The Kids a Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bully Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Apollitical Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in midway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $3500 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $5000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHUCK NAZTY rushed up to share the command from the two path, inched away in deep stretch to prevail. CATS GOTTA CHANCE was hustled to the front to share command from the inside and fought gamely to the wire but was out kicked. OPTIMAL was away alertly then dueled from off the pace but was no match for the top two. ARIMONY dueled from off the pace while chasing the top two.

ENTRY.NAME: Cats Gotta Chance
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, shared command, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Arimony
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace duel, chasing top two

ENTRY.NAME: Optimal
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, off pace duel, inch away turn, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Chuck Nazty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, shared command, inch away, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITE RANCHIN KID sprinted away to set a pressured early pace then edged away on the turn, drifted out late but lasted. TAP TAP HUSTO vied for the lead from the four path then showed late effort to be up for the place. TOOMANYNAMES rushed up to vie for the lead from between horses and fought gamely but yielded late. WHAT THE HEY was steadied before the turn then chased the leaders and passed tiring rival. SHUDDER was off the pace on the inside, slipped through at the three furlong marker but tired in the stretch. CAUTION CARDINAL had no early speed and was not a threat. MOONSPLASH raced greenly and remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: Lite Ranchin Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, pressured pace, drifted out late, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Shudder
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, slip thru, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Moonsplash
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced greenly, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: What the Hey
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early, chased leaders, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Caution Cardinal
ENTRY.OWNER: Barro Racing LLC and Frey Joe T
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Toomanynames
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, vied between, gamely, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Tap Husto
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, late effort, up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 4800. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FULL SPIRIT sprinted away to set all the pace then drew off in the stretch to prove best. BIG CREEK FIRE vied for the early lead from between horses to the half mile marker then fell back on the turn, made a rebid on the rail in the stretch to be second best. IMA HAPPY DANCER pressed the pace from three wide to the three furlong marker, weakened in the stretch and was outfinished. GREEDY rushed up to be close to the pace from four wide at the three furlong marker tipped out farther in the stretch and improved position. PIZZA GIRL was bumped sideways at the break, saved ground around the turn and made a mild bid in early stretch but failed to menace. DESERT SUNSET had an awkward start and was not a factor. AUNT CARI stumbled at the start and had no impact. DESERT PEPPER stumbled to knees leaving the gate and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Full Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, set pace, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Sunset
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Pizza Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped sideways, saved ground, mild bid, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Pepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Creek Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between, fell back, rail bid stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Happy Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3w3/8, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Greedy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, 4w3/8, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Cari
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $3500 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $5000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JIMBO'S BIZ stalked the pace from three wide to the three furlong marker then took command and drew off to prove best. PERVASIVE was allowed to settle down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker for a late rally and was clearly second best. TIGER BY HIS TAIL went to a clear early lead to set the pace for a half but was through and finished evenly. THORNISH was off the pace on the inside, angled out to two or three wide near the half mile marker then dropped back on the turn and never rallied. MEAN CANNON was saving ground on the backstretch but lacked room near the half mile marker, kept on to save ground around the turn and failed to menace. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF MEAN CANNON CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF THORNISH FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE NEAR THE HALF MILE MARKER, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Thornish
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2-3w 1/2, dropped back, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Pervasive
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3w3/8, late rally, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Cannon
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, lacked room 1/2, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Jimbo's Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, led 5/16, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger by His Tail
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, pace, thru after 1/2, evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Spicy S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 78. Stakes Purse 35738. PURSE $35,738. Three-year-olds and older Colorado Bred fillies and mares. Weight 124 lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCKIN MARIE shared the command from the inside to the three furlong marker then edged away at midturn and won going away to prove best. A J'S RIDE chased the leader to mid turn then made a three wide bid at the quarter pole but was no match for the winner but was clearly second best. CHASING DIVINITY trailed the field to mid stretch and passed the tiring rival to be along for show. CELEE'S LAST TE shared the command from the two path to the three furlong marker, fought gamely to the top of the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Rockin Marie
ENTRY.OWNER: Long Vaughn Meyer Curtis and West Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, edged away, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing Divinity
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rival, along show

ENTRY.NAME: A J's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, 3w1/4, no match, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Celee's Last Te
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, gamely, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLD FASHION TIME sprinted away to a clear lead down the backstretch the was challenged at the top of the stretch, battled in the drive but was drifting out near the and bumping INCREDIBE MO repeatedly eighth pole but kept on to prevail. INCREDIBE MO was off the pace from three wide down the backstretch then tipped in at the seven sixteenths pole, moved up to engage the leader at the top of the stretch and battled with OLD FASHION TIME from the outside but was bumped repeatedly and forced out but continued to fight gamely to be second best. EL JEFE COBB trailed the field while saving ground to the three furlong marker then tipped out to three wide and went between horses at the quarter pole to make a late rally, angled in in the final yards to be best of the rest. TIZKANDOIT raced in the middle of the pack in the early stages then steadily advanced down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the turn and into the stretch but faltered. DOMERGOO was last away, steadily advanced while racing five wide through the turn and flattened out in the stretch. LOOPY DUDE tracked the leaders down the backstretch but appeared to dislike the track and dropped back on the turn. BATTLEOF TRAFALGAR remained back. COMFORT KISS pressed the pace down the backstretch from the two path then floated out going into the turn and was taken up, jogged in. AN INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE STRETCH RUN, ALONG WITH A JOCKEY OBJECTION, THE JOCKEY OF INCREDIBE MO CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF OLD FASHION TIME FOR INTERFERENCE NEAR THE EIGHTH POLE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS ALLOWED AND OLD FASHION TIME WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST TO SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Old Fashion Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint away, clear lead, headed, drift out, bumped, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: El Jefe Cobb
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground, 3wturn, rallied, angle in, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Comfort Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, floated out turn, taken up, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Incredibe Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3w, tip in 7/16, engaged upper, bump, forced out, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Loopy Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, disliked track, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Domergoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 5wtrip, steady advance, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Battleof Trafalgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Tizkandoit
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, steady advance, rail bid turn, faltered
